content.rendered:
This eBook will describe all the basic foundations of effective CI/CD workflows, but instead of talking only in generic terms, we will explain all the technicalities behind each best practice and more importantly, how it can affect you if you don’t adopt it.

This eBook contains over 20 actionable best practices, including:

  • Creating a single artifact for all environments
  • Moving artifacts and not commits in your pipeline
  • Using short lived branches
  • Automating your rollbacks
  • Using Progressive Delivery patterns
  • And much more!

 

Lean not just the “why” but also the “how” to apply CI/CD best practices. Complete the form to get your complimentary copy.
